## \_getControlObserver$() function

Responsible for creating an observer from a [ControlHook](./dynamic-forms.controlhook.md) that executes the hooks callback on value changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getControlObserver$<TResponse>(hook: ControlHook<TResponse>, form: FormGroup, ignoreInitial?: boolean): Observable<TResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hook | [ControlHook](./dynamic-forms.controlhook.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResponse&gt; | A control hook to create an observer with |
|  form | FormGroup | A form containing the control |
|  ignoreInitial | boolean | Set to true if initial control value should be ignored. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Observable&lt;TResponse&gt;

An observable of the hooks callback response
